Files Headings

ITestHarness.as
¶

* * ITestHarness * * An interface to specify what's available for test cases to use. * Copyright (c) 2007 Henri Torgemane * * See LICENSE.txt for full license information.

 
package com.hurlant.crypto.tests
{
  public interface ITestHarness
  {
    function beginTestCase(name:String):void;
    function endTestCase():void;
    
    function beginTest(name:String):void;
    function passTest():void;
    function failTest(msg:String):void;
  }
}
